sentences.sContent: ...a second disk that offers, among other enticements, an interactive tour of Hogwarts.
sentences.sCn: ...第二张盘提供了种种诱惑，其中包括一个霍格华兹的互动游览程序。

synos.tran: 诱惑；怂恿；引诱物；吸引力

trans.tranCn: 诱惑, 怂恿, 引诱
trans.tranOther: An enticement is something that makes people want to do a particular thing
